actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on January 24, 2023.

actions-list.header: Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to sections 5580 and 5581 of the revised statutes (20 U.S.C. 42-43), and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution: Mr. Smith of Nebraska and Mr. Graves of Louisiana.

actions-list.header: Commission on Security and Cooperation in Europe
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to 22 U.S.C. 3003, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following member of the House to the Commission on Security and Cooperation in Europe: Mr. Wilson of South Carolina.

actions-list.header: United States Group of the NATO Parliamentary Assembly
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to 22 U.S.C. 1928a, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following member of the House to the United States Group of the NATO Parliamentary Assembly: Mr. Turner.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Patrick T. McHenry to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
